message_1: What is the final product of the decay series of radium-226?
message_2: The final product of the decay series of radium-226 is stable lead-206 (Pb-206). Radium-226 undergoes a series of radioactive decays, including alpha and beta decays, through various intermediate isotopes such as radon-222, polonium-218, and bismuth-214, among others, before ultimately reaching the stable isotope of lead-206.
